valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 21 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 22 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: New low expected Biscay 994 by midnight tonight. Low Rockall 991 losing its identity

Rockall.text:
Wind
In southwest, cyclonic becoming southerly or southeasterly, 3 to 5, occasionally 6 in north. In northeast, easterly or southeasterly 6 to gale 8, decreasing 4 to 6, occasionally 3 later.
Sea state
In southwest, high becoming very rough, then rough later. in northeast, very rough or high becoming rough or very rough.
Weather
In southwest, showers, fair later. In northeast, showers, squally at first.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally poor at first. In northeast, good, occasionally poor.
